 Posted: Liam Fedus, OpenAI’s VP of research for post-training, is leaving the company to found a materials science AI startup.  The Information initially reported Fedus’ plans. In a statement on X, Fedus confirmed the report and added a few additional details.  “My undergrad was in physics and I’m keen to apply this tec
